User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build ID: 20110615151330

Steps to reproduce:

1) Firefox reports the ability to update version 6.0
2) Once it detects conflict the new version wtih available plugins
3) I choise "install later"



Actual results:

Tomorrow istalator run again without taking non-compliance


Expected results:

They should wait until ALL of plugins will be ready
comments.creator: sosoba@coig.katowice.pl
